content: Am I here in the wrong place?
@Ait Tete - that depends entirely on where you want to be :)

I thought I would be able to find answer to my question of user authentication here. I installed the Hapi-Fhir today but it had no GUI for login. And I want to knwo which ones the community are using. Or what my best options are.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Ait Tete - that depends entirely on where you want to be :)

so where would you suggest I should be, based on my aswer

It looks like you had posted your follow-up under the wrong topic (CARIN BlueButton/SMART) rather than the one you'd originally initiated. This is certainly an acceptable place to seek help, though for HAPI-related questions, the #hapi stream is probably better. While the community is quite responsive and it's not uncommon to see answers in only 15-20 minutes, that's certainly not something you should expect. I'd wait at least a business day or perhaps two before bumping a thread if you haven't seen a response.
